about_the_game:
"Sprout's Words" is a card-style plot AVG, watch the plot bit by bit by clicking on the dialog box.

Plot introduction

In an old teacher's residential building of a high school, there lived a family of four, including a father, a mother, an elder brother, and a younger brother.

The elder brother didn't seem to like the relationship with his younger brother, but he didn't seem to want to lose his younger brother. The relationship between the elder brother and the younger brother was very ambiguous.

But everyone around the elder brother liked the younger brother very much, which gave the elder brother an additional major responsibility of care and also improved his social status to a certain extent.

But the elder brother's behavior was sometimes strange, as if he had something on his mind that he didn't say.

Part of the plot

Lin Ziyu panted as he stepped on the last few stairs. When he walked out of the rooftop door, the light immediately became much brighter, dispelling the dimness of the stairwell.

Lin Zijin: " -- Brother, look! The view on the rooftop is so beautiful! "

The wind on the rooftop blew gently, and Lin Ziyu walked slowly through the wind to his brother's side.

The sunset dyed the clouds in the sky red, and the whole sky was like a burning scroll, with many golden clouds floating above the heads of the two little boys.

Lin Ziyu: " Yes... "

Lin Ziyu only remembered to respond to his brother at this time.

A train passed by on the train track in the distance, and the train made a long and distant whistle.

Lin Zijin: " Brother, look -- there is a train. "

Lin Zijin pointed to the distance ahead.

Lin Ziyu did not respond, and kept staring blankly at the train passing in the distance.

Lin Zijin: " Brother, do you like watching the sunset? "

Lin Ziyu: " Yes. "

Lin Ziyu nodded.

Lin Zijin: " Brother, do you like watching trains? "

Lin Ziyu: " Yeah. "

Lin Ziyu nodded again.

Lin Zijin: " Brother, this feels like a dream. "

Lin Ziyu: " Dream, huh… "

Lin Zijin: " Brother, where do you want to go in the future? What do you want to do? "

Yu: What do I want to do in the future…

Lin Ziyu seemed to be thinking about something.

Lin Ziyu: " …I haven’t thought about it yet. "

Lin Zijin: " Brother, you grabbed my hand. "
